Convolutional Layer¶

class sknet.layer.Conv2D(incoming, filters, nonlinearity=1.0, training=None, batch_norm=True, init_W=<function variance_scaling_initializer.<locals>._initializer>, strides=1, pad='valid', mode='CONSTANT', name='')[source]¶

2D (spatial) convolutional layer. Layer to perform a 2D convolution onto a 4D input tensor

Parameters:
  • incoming (Layer or tuple of int) – input shape of incoming layer
  • filters (triple of int) – the shape of the filters in the form (#filters, height, width)
  • nonlinearity_c (scalar) – coefficient of the nonlinearity, 0 for ReLU,-1 for absolute value,…
